thread.title: VERBATIM: Trump will meet Kim Jong Un -S. Korean official

title: VERBATIM: Trump will meet Kim Jong Un -S. Korean official
text:
VERBATIM: Trump will meet Kim Jong Un -S. Korean official   01:07 
U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will meet by May and Kim has pledged to refrain from further nuclear or missile tests, South Korea’s national security chief said on Thursday after briefing White House officials on talks between Seoul and Pyongyang.   
U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will meet by May and Kim has pledged to refrain from further nuclear or missile tests, South Korea’s national security chief said on Thursday after briefing White House officials on talks between Seoul and Pyongyang.  //reut.rs/2p4eB06
